comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content:
Cusihuiriachic (ie Cusihuiriachi) es un pueblo minero en el centro de la región serrana del Estado de Chihuahua.
Dr. Roberto Duarte
Cirujano Plástico

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: jerodamor@yahoo.com.mx:  Thank you for pointing out the name of the town on the negative.  We will add the information when we update.

comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content:
Found in El Paso Herald, issue December 26, 1910, pages 1 and 8, second subheading, lines 3 and 4 that says: "Cusihuiriachic Is Reported Captured" (The Library of Congress, Cronicling America).  Although, by call nr. this picture is most likely situated in the year of 1911.
Dr. Roberto Duarte

comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content:
Found in Wikipedia, Revolución Mexicana, Batallas de la Revolución Mexicna.  1910
Toma de Cusihuiriachi
 20 de diciembre
 Pantaleón Bustillos y Matilde Romero toman Cusihuiriachi.
 Is it possible this picture tells about this?
